title: Start
body:
You are sitting on the patch of grass with your grade results. After reading, you find out that you have failed. The rage begins to build up inside of you and you begin to shake. How do you react?

[[Frustrated|frustrated]] 
[[Distraught|distraught]] 
[[Calm and Measured|calm]]

title: frustrated
body: "WHAT THE ACTUAL F**K? Surely not, all those late nights and stress for f**k all. I need to turn this around pronto"

title: distraught
body: "This can’t be right. I put too much work in for that. I need to change it, nobody will hire me with this. I can’t have failed. I need to do something about this."

title: calm
body: "Okay, just breathe, it's not the end of the world. There is probably something that I can do about it"
